title: India 3-Month MIBOR
description: India 3-Month MIBOR was at 6.46 percent on Wednesday November 9. Interbank Rate in India averaged 7.18 percent from 1998 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 12.27 percent in October of 2008 and a record low of 3.63 percent in December of 2020. In India, the interbank rate refers to the Mumbai InterBank Overnight Rate (MIBOR) which is the overnight lending rate for Indian commercial banks. This page provides - India Treasury Bill Yield - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: OTC Interbank
